desc: I am Kooky, Freeze Dried Fruit, Gently Dried Fruit, Dragonfruit, Jackfruit, Mangosteen, Mango, Banana, Pretty Unique Fruit

layout.text: With striking colours and vivid flavours, our fruit is beautifully unusual. At Kooky, we want to inspire YOU to challenge conventional ideals of beauty, encourage tolerance and cherish differences.
